title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs, cheese, and black pepper.
In a pan, cook the bacon until crispy.
Add the cooked spaghetti to the pan with the bacon and toss to combine.
Remove the pan from the heat and add the egg mixture, stirring quickly to coat the spaghetti.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt, ginger garlic paste, and spices for at least 2 hours.
Grill the chicken until cooked through.
In a pan, sauté onions, ginger garlic paste, and spices until fragrant.
Add the tomato puree and cook until the oil separates.
Add the grilled chicken and cream to the pan and simmer until the sauce thickens.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Chicken Alfredo
summary: A simple and quick weeknight dinner made with fettuccine, cream, butter, and Parmesan.
instructions: Cook the fettuccine according to the package instructions.
In a pan, cook the chicken until browned and cooked through.
Add the cream, butter, and Parmesan to the pan and simmer until the sauce thickens.
Add the cooked fettuccine to the pan and toss to combine.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan.

title: Chicken Parmesan
summary: A classic Italian-American dish made with breaded chicken, marinara sauce, and mozzarella cheese.
instructions: Pound the chicken breasts until thin and even.
Dip the chicken in beaten eggs and then coat in breadcrumbs.
Fry the chicken until golden brown and cooked through.
Top the chicken with marinara sauce and mozzarella cheese.
Bake until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
Serve with pasta or a salad.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: A Russian dish made with sautéed pieces of beef served in a sauce with sour cream.
instructions: Sauté the beef until browned and cooked through.
Add the onions and mushrooms to the pan and cook until softened.
Add the beef broth and simmer until the sauce thickens.
Stir in the sour cream and heat through.
Serve over egg noodles or rice.
